meanings.definition: A building behind or at the rear of a main building, typically used for storage or as a toilet.
meanings.sent1: The backhouses behind the school store old books and supplies.
meanings.sent2: The backhouses in the neighborhood are small and well-maintained.
meanings.sent3: During the game of hide-and-seek, the kids pretended the backhouses were secret hideouts.
meanings.sent4: The backhouses stood like silent guardians at the edge of the property.
meanings.sent5: The smell of flowers wafted from the backhouses, making the garden even more inviting.
